text: Paul de Jersey, (born 21 September 1948) is an Australian jurist. He was the Governor of Queensland from 2014 until 2021. In November 2018 it was announced that de Jersey's original term had been extended by two years. From 1998 to 2014, he was Chief Justice of Queensland. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Queensland Category:Australian judges Category:Politicians from Brisbane
title: Paul de Jersey
